titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.
To amend title II of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to eliminate the time limitation for corrections to wage and self-employment income records.
